name: Brenda Del Toro
smDescription: Exploring AI & QA | Advocate for Smart Innovation

about.summary: With over five years of experience in software development, I specialize in front-end development. Currently based in Ottawa, I am actively refreshing my skills and exploring new technologies, while also advancing my French at the Alliance Fran√ßaise. After a previous career pause dedicated to caring for my family, I am now ready to contribute a proactive, solutions-oriented approach to a team.

timeline.title: Front-End Developer
description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React.js and Next.js, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimal performance.
Collaborated with clients to gather requirements, design user interfaces, and implement features that enhance user experience.
Utilized Tailwind CSS to create visually appealing and consistent designs across various projects.

timeline.title: Software Developer
description: Led the front-end development of multiple web applications, improving user engagement by 30% through intuitive design and functionality.
Worked closely with back-end developers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless data flow between front-end and back-end systems.
Implemented best practices for code quality, including code reviews, unit testing, and continuous integration.

timeline.title: Junior Developer
description: Assisted in the development of client websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, contributing to a 15% increase in client satisfaction.
Participated in team meetings to discuss project progress, challenges, and solutions, fostering a collaborative work environment.
Maintained documentation for codebases and created user guides to facilitate knowledge sharing within the team.
